abstract: JPMorgan Chase named Drago Rajkovic to lead the bank’s technology-related mergers and acquisitions group, according to an internal e-mail.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase named Drago Rajkovic to lead the bank’s technology-related mergers and acquisitions group, according to an internal e-mail.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase has hired Drago Rajkovic, a Wall Street veteran who most recently worked for Barclays Capital, to lead the bank’s technology-related mergers and acquisitions group, according to an internal e-mail obtained by DealBook.

headline.main: JPMorgan Hires Former Barclays M.&A. Banker
